import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' export default function Preview() { const [dept, setDept] = useState(''); const [sem, setSem] = useState(''); const [sect, setSect] = useState(''); const [date, setDate] = useState(''); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); //useeffect hook axios.defaults.withCredentials = true; useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:3001/preview') .then(result => { console.log(result) if (result.data !== "success") { navigate('/') } }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:3001/preview') .then(users => setUsers(users.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) return (
